Docs.summary: Renders a 3-D model that supports input, focus, and events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelUIElement3D> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
## Examples The following example shows how to create two cubes using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelUIElement3D> class:
[!code-xaml[ContainerModelSample#Viewport3D](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContainerModelSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml#viewport3d)]
The cubes respond to the mouse down event through the following event handlers:
For the complete sample, see [Handling Events in 3-D Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159992) .
